Tunable.name: ADOPTED_BY_SIM_BIT
Tunable.description: A bit indicating that the target of the relationship is the sim that adopted the source. (Opposite of ADOPTED_SIM_BIT)

Tunable.name: ADOPTED_SIM_BIT
Tunable.description: A bit indicating that the target of the relationship is the sim that the source adopted. (Opposite of ADOPTED_BY_SIM_BIT)

TunableList.name: CLOSE_FAMILY_MATRIX
TunableList.description: 4x4 Matrix that contains all the relbits that represent close family, which are those that can happen in family relations between Sim A and Sim B. These shall be Spouse, Parent, Grandparent, Great-Grandparent, Child, Sibling, Uncle/Aunt, Great Uncle/Aunt, Grandchild, Nephew, Cousin, 1st Cousin Once Removed, Great Grandchild, Grand Nephew or Niece, 1st Cousin Once Removed, and 2nd Cousin. The indices to access this matrix shall be the Ancestry Depth for both sims. ---- Sim B's ancestry depth ----> +-------------+-------------+-------------+-------------+ | | | | Great | | Spouse | Parent | Grandparent | Grandparent | |0-0 |1-0 |2-0 |3-0 | +-------------+-------------+-------------+-------------+ | | | | | Grand | | | Child | Sibling | Uncle/Aunt | Uncle/Aunt | | |0-1 |1-1 |2-1 |3-1 | Sim A's +-------------+-------------+-------------+-------------+ ancestry | | Nephew | | 1st Cousin | depth | Grandchild | /Niece | Cousin | 1xRemoved | | |0-2 |1-2 |2-2 |3-2 | | +-------------+-------------+-------------+-------------+ V | Great | Grand | 1st Cousin | | | Grandchild |Nephew/Niece | 1xRemoved | 2nd Cousin | |0-3 |1-3 |2-3 |3-3 | +-------------+-------------+-------------+-------------+

Tunable.name: DEAD_SPOUSE_RELATIONSHIP_BIT
Tunable.description: A bit indicating that one Sim is another Sim's deceased spouse.

Tunable.name: DISTANT_ANCESTOR_BIT
Tunable.description: A bit indicating that one Sim is another Sim's distant ancestor.

Tunable.name: DISTANT_DESCENDANT_BIT
Tunable.description: A bit indicating that one Sim is another Sim's distant descendant.

Tunable.name: DISTANT_RELATIVE_BIT
Tunable.description: A bit indicating that one Sim is another Sim's distant relative.

Tunable.name: DIVORCED_SPOUSE_RELATIONSHIP_BIT
Tunable.description: A bit indicating that one Sim is another Sim's estranged spouse.

TunableList.name: EXTENDED_FAMILY_MATRIX
TunableList.description: 3x3 Matrix that contains all the relbits that represent extended family, which are those that can happen in family relations between Sim A's Partner and Sim B. These shall be Spouse, Parent in Law, Grandparent in Law, Child, Sibling in Law, Uncle or Aunt in Law, Grand Child, Nephew or Niece in Law, and Cousin in Law. The indices to access this matrix shall be the Ancestry Depth for both sims. Note that in contrast with the CLOSE_FAMILY_MATRIX matrix, this one uses Sim A's Partner's ancestry depth in relation to Sim B, not Sim A's ancestry depth. --- Sim B's ancestry depth ---> +-------------+-------------+-------------+ | | Parent | | | Spouse | in | Grandparent | | | Law | in Law | | +-------------+-------------+-------------+ | | | Sibling | Uncle or | Sim A's | Child | in | Aunt in | partner's | | Law | Law | ancestry +-------------+-------------+-------------+ depth | | Nephew or | Cousin | | | Grandchild | Niece in | in | V | | Law | Law | +-------------+-------------+-------------+

Tunable.name: GENERIC_IN_LAW_BIT
Tunable.description: A bit indicating that one Sim is another Sim's generic/distant inlaw. Used as fallback for inlaws that are not represented in the matrix, or are just enough far away for us to not care that much, but still want to indicate they're inlaws.

Tunable.name: HALF_SIBLING_RELATIONSHIP_BIT
Tunable.description: A bit indicating that one Sim is another Sim's half sibling (they share the same parent, but not the other).

Tunable.name: HIDDEN_STEP_FAMILY_RELATIONSHIP_BIT
Tunable.description: A bit indicating that one Sim was another Sim's step-family before the sim connecting them died.

Tunable.name: HIDDEN_STEP_PARENT_RELATIONSHIP_BIT
Tunable.description: A bit indicating that one Sim was another Sim's step-parent before the sim connecting them died.

Tunable.name: SPOUSE_OF_CHILD_RELATIONSHIP_BIT
Tunable.description: A bit indicating that one Sim is the spouse of another Sim's child.

Tunable.name: SPOUSE_OF_GRAND_CHILD_RELATIONSHIP_BIT
Tunable.display: Spouse Of Grand Child Relationship Bit
Tunable.description: A bit indicating that one Sim is the spouse of another Sim's grand-child.

Tunable.name: SPOUSE_OF_PIBLING_RELATIONSHIP_BIT
Tunable.description: A bit indicating that one Sim is the spouse of another Sim's pibling (sibling of parent).

Tunable.name: STEP_CHILD_RELATIONSHIP_BIT
Tunable.description: A bit indicating that one Sim is another Sim's step-child.

Tunable.name: STEP_PARENT_RELATIONSHIP_BIT
Tunable.description: A bit indicating that one Sim is another Sim's step-parent.

Tunable.name: STEP_SIBLING_RELATIONSHIP_BIT
Tunable.description: A bit indicating that one Sim is another Sim's step-sibling.
